Articles.Content:
Yesterday, I started up KSP for the first time in about 5 months (after updating to 1.2.2) and immediately headed for the SPH. 10 minutes later, I had completed this monstrosity: the Swan HC-80.

Powered by two Ramjet engines attached to the body on either side, this plane features a large cargo bay with a ramp, a Mk1 plane cockpit at the front, and what gives the HC-80 its name, gradual adapters from 1.25m to Mk3. Also, unseen in these screenshots, a small lander pod capsule at the front of the cargo bay for transferring Kerbals in and out of the cockpit. Minimum takeoff speed on flat land is 57-60 m/s.

Download it here: https://www.dropbox.com/s/yhtt8b9qqa4yrw6/Swan HC-80.craft?dl=0

Edited January 28, 2017 by UnionPacific1983WP
